Values: Michael C. Brennan, John E. Herr, Triet S. Nguyen-Beck, Jessica Zinna, Sergiu Draguta, Sergei Rouvimov, John Parkhill, Masaru Kuno
Department of Chemistry and Biochemistry, University of Notre Dame; Notre Dame Integrated Imaging Facility, University of Notre Dame, Notre Dame, Indiana, United States.
Journal of the American Chemical Society (JACS)
"Origin of the Size-Dependent Stokes Shift in CsPbBr3 Perovskite Nanocrystals."

Excitation wavelength: 350 nm
Emission wavelengths: Variable (dependent on NC size)

1. Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM), 2. Powder X-ray Diffraction (PXRD), 3. Time-Correlated Single Photon Counting Time-Resolved Emission Spectroscopy (TCSPC-TRES), 4. Photoluminescence (PL) and Photoluminescence Excitation (PLE) Spectroscopy.
Use in photovoltaic devices and lighting/display technologies. Photocatalysis not mentioned.
